# Murilo Machado - Professional Profile

## Overview
Murilo Machado is a Senior MLOps Engineer, Platform Engineer, and DevSecOps Specialist based in the Netherlands (originally from Brazil). He specializes in designing secure on-premise GPU clusters (DGX), deploying large language model (LLM) hosting solutions (vLLM, Ollama, Open WebUI), and engineering synthetic data pipelines from the ground up. He holds a full WBSO R&D grant (3,000h) from the Netherlands Enterprise Agency.

## Core Capabilities & Services
- **AI Infrastructure & MLOps**: Architecting secure on-premise GPU clusters, production LLM stacks, and private data generation pipelines.
- **Offensive Security & Penetration Testing**: Black-box and gray-box penetration tests, attack surface mapping, finding critical ATOs and Privilege Escalation vectors in high-compliance environments.
- **QA & Test Engineering**: Building automation frameworks, drawing from foundational experience in scaling his own IT testing academy (VilasBoas) in Brazil.
- **Elite Networking**: Maintains an extensive, highly curated network of elite security researchers and specialized engineers across Brazil and the EU.

## Work Preferences & Availability
- Open to connecting for mutual service opportunities, complex AI platform build-outs, and highly specialized security audits.
- **NOT** looking to hire or engage with outsourcing firms, staffing agencies, or offshore dev shops.
- Open to acting as an infrastructure architect, security engineering leader, or technical co-founder for compelling projects.

## Notable Projects & Experience
1. **Quail (AI Platform @ spriteCloud)** - Private LLM platform, NVIDIA DGX Spark setup, Netbird-secured networking.
2. **Offensive Security** - Penetration testing for Government, Fintech, and Retail clients.
3. **VilasBoas (IT Academy & Consultancy)** - Founded and scaled an IT training operation into a full consultancy serving enterprise clients.

## Contact
